Attention!

This event is not yet released on the Global server; the following information is based on translations which may not match the official English localization and will be updated when the Global release is announced.

Rebuilding Mandate
Abbreviation
RM
Type
Special event
In Other Languages
Chinese
次生预案
Release
CN date
2025/09/25–2025/10/16

Rebuilding Mandate is a special game mode in Arknights.

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Operations
  • 3 Headhunting
  • 4 Construction Promotion Plan
  • 5 Newborn Pivot Login Event
  • 6 Outfits
  • 7 Navigation

Overview[edit]

The game mode is very similar to Loop Hero, with map building and expansion mechanics and internal-mode promoting of operators.

Operations[edit]

Clear 1-10 to access Rebuilding Mandate.

Ordinary places RM-TR-1 • RM-1 • RM-2 • RM-3 • RM-4 • RM-5 • RM-6
Dangerous places RM-H1 • RM-H2 • RM-H3 • RM-H4 • RM-H5 • RM-H6 • RM-H7 • RM-H8
Additional information:
  • RM-5 and RM-6 are available on the 3rd day of the event
  • RM-H1 and RM-H2 are available after clearing RM-3
  • RM-H3 and RM-H4 are available after clearing RM-4
  • RM-H5 to RM-H8 are available on the 7th day of the event, and:
    RM-H5 and RM-H6 are available after clearing RM-5
    RM-H7 and RM-H8 are available after clearing RM-6

Headhunting[edit]

Main article: Headhunting/Banners/Upcoming

The fourth Orienteering headhunting banner is featured.

Newborn Pivot Login Event[edit]

Players can log in from September 28, 2025 until October 8, 2025 to receive various rewards.

Outfits[edit]

New
Re-edition
Additional information:
  • Moon Under the Pines and Autumn Shadow will be available until October 20 while the rest of the old outfits will be available until October 9.
  • The Remains of Time can only be obtained from purchasing the Rise from Ember pack and will be available until November 6.
